    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Nutrición en animales</string>
            <string language="en">Nutrition in animals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung in den Tieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nutrition chez les animaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nutrition nos animais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nutrizione in animali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διατροφή στα ζώα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se describe el tipo de nutrición de los animales y los dos tipos de aparatos digestivos, en forma de saco y de tubo.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic describing the type of nutrition of related to animals and the two types of digestive systems, in the form of a bag and in the form of a tube.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Nutrición</string>
            <string language="en">Nutrition</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das den Typen von Nahrung von in 
Verbindung stehendem mit Tieren und die zwei Typen der 
Verdauungssysteme, in Form eines Beutels und in Form eines Gefäßes 
beschreibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décrivant le type de nutrition de connexe 
aux animaux et les deux types des systèmes digestifs, sous forme de 
sac et sous forme de tube.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que descreve o tipo de nutrition de 
relacionado aos animais e os dois tipos de sistemas digestivos, no 
formulário de um saco e no formulário de um tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che descrive il tipo di nutrizione di 
relativo agli animali ed i due tipi dei sistemi digestivi, sotto forma
d'un sacchetto e sotto forma d'un tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που περιγράφει τον τύπο διατροφής σχετικός με τα
ζώα και τους δύο τύπους χωνευτικών συστημάτων, υπό μορφή 
τσάντας και υπό μορφή σωλήνα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
